timeline.bodyText: I was thinking that when we allow split, that the first region would no longer have a regionid of '1'. Rather, it would have the 'natural' number, the hash, as user-space regions have. Old clients would keep referring to the old region name w/ the replicaid of '1'... We use this fact figuring when to put up the facade over hbase:meta for old clients to use.
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: OK, let's remove the specific region id now. Later let's see if it is possible to keep compatible for old clients.
